title: Prohibited acts
context: [ยง148-65] Prohibited acts. No person shall: (1) Use a seal of quality established under this part without being licensed; (2) Use a seal of quality on a fresh or processed agricultural commodity that does not meet the requirements of this part; (3) Use a device, symbol, indicia, or by any other means imitate the seal of quality established by this part; or (4) Make any claim that a fresh or processed agricultural commodity is permitted to use a seal of quality when it is not. [L 2002, c 163, pt of ยง2]
